name: BlackFaith
description: BlackFaith a Survival horror game based on local horror stories podcast
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions) Processor: Intel Core i5-2400/AMD FX-8320 or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 670 2GB/AMD Radeon HD 7870 2GB or better DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 8 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
